website_summaries.verdict: Traditional white floating candles in a handy 25-pack. A good value; but they don't tend to burn as long as some users expect.
pros: Basic, clean-looking white floating candles that come in an affordable pack of 24
cons: Reports of packages arriving with broken, defective, or melted candles
Not likely to burn for the indicated 10 hours

customer_reviews.title: Great candles that’ll burn for hours !
customer_reviews.text: We got these candles for our wedding center pieces. They burn for at least 10 hours and looks brilliant the entire time! I stayed home one day just to see how long it’ll burn and by our 10 it was still going strong. Definitely would recommend!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for maybe two hours
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister's wedding reception and half of the candles were out by the two-hour mark. They were supposed to last up to ten hours, so I thought a four-hour wedding reception would be no issue. The candles that went out did one of two things. They either just quit burning entirely or they would start to sink into the water and the flame would be extinguished. It was embarrassing because I was hoping these candles would last as they were in the main centerpieces on the table. I'm giving two stars because the ones that did work and last looked nice. Don't buy these candles if you want reliable candles for your event!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Duke

customer_reviews.title: Burns very long time
customer_reviews.text: Got them yesterday and a did a trial burn, I got 7 hours before I headed to bed and it would have kept burning. These will perfect for daughters wedding Update! Used them for daughters wedding and they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica jean

customer_reviews.title: Warped and not round. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what happened to these candles, but they are not round. I have ordered these before and they were perfectly round. I am guessing they decided to send these warped candles, hoping I would overlook their warped shapes. Unbelievable. Returning them. What a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my sister’s bridal shower. I bought vases from the dollar store, hot glued some gold wrap around it, used some floating pearls and topped it with these candles. I loved it! They were the perfect size, burned the entire event and can even be reused.
customer_reviews.author: Boutique Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Slow Burn, Product works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: To be perfectly honest, we haven't tested these 100% yet - longest we've had them burn continuously is 7 hours so far, but there was still plenty of wax and wick left at the end, so I don't have a worry that they'd last 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: rcc-GTO

customer_reviews.title: Packaged Very Neatly!!
customer_reviews.text: These candles were delivered very neatly. None of them were broken and there was a piece of cardboard separating each layer. I absolutely loved that!! Just the packaging of the product will make me buy it again. I'm using them for my wedding reception decorations . They are beautiful and very clean and white.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for centerpieces
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my wedding centerpieces. They were lit for approximately 7 hours from set up to clean up, and all of them lasted that long. The candles were a bright white, unlike most of the "white" candles I looked at that were slightly off-white. I can't believe how much cheaper these were than all of the other 3" floating candles I looked at - such a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Roman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT floating candles!
customer_reviews.text: We need floating candles for my daughters wedding and wanted to make sure they are good quality and will last many hours. I did a test with one and it burned clean and stayed floating the whole time. It burned for over 10 hours. We did lots of comparing and this is the best price point we found as well. Will definitely buy these again for my home and other events.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice candles!!! Not too thick or too thin. They arrived very well packaged and look lovely in my candle jars. I lit one and burned it for 5 hours before I blew it out. It still looked great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: The candles arrived quickly and intact. Tried them out in a vase with water and they floated well. We are using the candles for a clients wedding in September.
customer_reviews.author: VJL

customer_reviews.title: Will continue buying these as needed
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I've ordered these candles. They float well. Last long.
customer_reviews.author: LSPayor

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melted
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these candles because by the time I received them they were melted and the wick has been buried in the wax. They were unusable in that condition. But I do live in Texas and it is 100F outside during summertime, so I understand it is more a shipping mishap. If you live somewhere cooler, or the weather is fairer, this should not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Had to order different ones as these weren't the same size as usual
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these candles previously and have had wonderful luck with them. The most recent order I placed for them, they came and aren't the normal size of 3", they are slightly bigger. Don't seem as good of quality. I put them in cylinder vases for wedding decor and they don't fit like they usually do. Not sure if it was a bad box, but I had to order different ones that fit as I needed them to.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floaters!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly inside the floral vases we purchased and made an amazing statement in wedding center pieces! Long burning, smooth edged, easy to light (and stay lit), I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Wedding use
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my wedding. They lasted all 5 hours of the reception. I was worried some would be damaged when I ordered, but had no imperfections noted.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and last a long time!
customer_reviews.text: These last all day! Perfect size and they float nicely. Exactly what I wanted!! I will use these for center pieces at my wedding in tall vases. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Granner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, long-lasting candles for special events.
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality. Long lasting. I used them for a special dinner event. They burned for four hours and would have lasted longer. I am happy with this purchase and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MWG2

customer_reviews.title: Love your candles!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely happy with the candles. We used all 24 and they were lit for at least for 6hrs and all stayed lit the whole time. I will definitely be ordering more of them. I own 33 cylinder vases, 3 different sizes and these candles work very well in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burn time is accurate
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles. They burned for 10 hours. The candle added elegance to my party!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a wedding that ended up on zoom so didn’t use them. They looked of good quality tho
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Quality and affordable! Perfect for your event!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these candles for my daughter's wedding. Shipping was fast and they were good quality candles. They were lit for 6 hours at the reception and would have burned a lot longer! They were very pretty in our centerpieces! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cg71

customer_reviews.title: Used for wedding decor
customer_reviews.text: I used them in cylinder vases with water for my wedding and they worked well as intended!
customer_reviews.author: KaseyK

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used them for a wedding. They are not individually wrapped which helped speed up the set up. Light up easily and long lasting (entire night)
customer_reviews.author: Blanca S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wedding in November. I wanted to test them out to see if they would hold up during our reception. It was still burning strong at 5 hours and I believe it will definitely hold up on our wedding day! I recommend these for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Paige Dean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Wedding Reception!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak for the 10 hours but they lasted our entire wedding reception and the flames did not get out of control (I cut the wicks down to 1/4” like the instructions stated). They also fit perfectly in our candle holders that were slightly wider than 3”.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great floating candles
customer_reviews.text: Appreciated the protective boxing...great candles for our floating vases. Perfect size and lasted several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Did not use yet but item is exactly as described and looks perfect in my centerpieces
customer_reviews.author: pittsburghmommy724

customer_reviews.title: White floating candles as described
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our wedding, haven’t used them yet but they arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: kelligirl

customer_reviews.title: Floating candles
customer_reviews.text: Love these floating candles and will be using them for my upcoming wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles were perfect for my centerpiece. They were the perfect size and thickness. Only thing is some burn quicker than others
customer_reviews.author: Nursinggirl4

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered these candles they are the best and great value
customer_reviews.author: Nichole C.

customer_reviews.title: Broken candles
customer_reviews.text: Candles came broken when I received them. Most of them had chunks out of them, broken, or cracked. Very few had nothing wrong with them. Plus I don’t know if it will cost me if I have to return them. It just says they will replace if I ship them back but I don’t feel like I should have to pay for that.
customer_reviews.author: Princess0305

customer_reviews.title: There were very big
customer_reviews.text: It was for my nieces baby shower enjoy them it slow in burning.
customer_reviews.author: rosa velez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Weddings
customer_reviews.text: Used in cylinder vases for daughter’s wedding. Lasted over 10 hours. Recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Longevity
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use in centerpieces for my wedding and they were perfect. They were simple, and didnt burn through fast.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Opened box immediately when received. All candles were shaped corrected. I used 72 at my daughter's wedding. All floated and stayed lite for over 5 hours. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Robertson

customer_reviews.title: They don’t stay lit.
customer_reviews.text: They appear to be a good deal but I used them for birthday party and only 1 stayed lit. They light and turn off . It was very disappointing as they were the center pieces on all the tables.
customer_reviews.author: Ney

customer_reviews.title: No packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Candles didn’t come in a container or even a bag, they were just packed straight into the cardboard box! I like them but don’t know how I’m supposed to store them!
customer_reviews.author: Penina Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Long burning candles
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a wedding and had lit for 7 hours. Lasted the whole time and still had to be exti nguished at the end of the evening. Really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my sisters wedding votives and they were perfect! Nothing can beat the glow of real candle light.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sinek

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy about purchasing after reading all the bad reviews . well I'm glad I put took the chance . They arrived well packaged and all perfectly round shape and size just as described .
customer_reviews.author: Freddie reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles
customer_reviews.text: Great candles! They added a lot to our church’s Sweatheart Banquet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Thornsley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for awesome pricing
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing and exactly what I was looking for! The price was the best and the quality was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow burning elegance
customer_reviews.text: They burned for about 6 hours and could have gone for longer. The float very well and are very elegant looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Bell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Came in timely matter, nothing broken so that’s a plus. Have not used any so not sure if they last long, but very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Mayares

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: None of the lights went out that I could tell.
customer_reviews.author: chantale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wedding
customer_reviews.text: We used these candles for our wedding centerpieces. They were lit for close to six hours and still have over half the candle left to burn! They did not get any wax on the glassware and melted beautifully. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Werner

customer_reviews.title: Check inside
customer_reviews.text: Check your boxes! I bought these before and they were great. The second box ordered looked like this. I have a wedding in 14 days and thank god I opened them before it because that would have been an disaster!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not very long lasting, water seeped through.
customer_reviews.text: The candles only last for 3 to 4 hours. It starts leaking water at the bottom. Does not last very long. I am going to try a new brand
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but doesn’t work for long events
customer_reviews.text: Great thickness, but candles don’t stay lit very long. Go out after like an hour.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality good price
customer_reviews.text: I am an event planner and designer and these floating candles are perfect for my events! They lasted all night long without going out and even some of them I saved for another event! Great quality great price!
customer_reviews.author: Paola Oller

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great price
customer_reviews.text: Great candles that burn for over ten hours. Very happy that I bought them and will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our party
customer_reviews.text: Candles fit our cylinders perfectly, and were long-lasting and good quality
customer_reviews.author: JillAnne M.

customer_reviews.title: Good, Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: These candles were well made and exactly as I expected size wise. We used them for my son’s reception and had them burning for 6-7 hours and there is still plenty of each candle left that I could use them again if I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Healy

customer_reviews.title: SIZING
customer_reviews.text: Candles look and work fine but if you order more than two cases they will ship you 3 inch candles instead. This is my second time ordering and having to return so it's not just a one time mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Begini

customer_reviews.title: Really cool candles
customer_reviews.text: They are nicely packed..true to the size being sold. Can do really cool centre pieces with these. I used mine for valentines center pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin

customer_reviews.title: Looked great at my wedding!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Burned all night at my wedding and looked great! They were the right size I needed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jess263

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I looked all over and the cost for candles (when you need so many) is expensive, I found these classic floating candles with the 10 hour burn and decided to check them out. So glad I did. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Appearance wasn't the same as the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The candles did not look like this when I got them. They were flat and wide candles. I haven't used them yet, so I don't know how long they will last. Appearance was totally different, but I don't feel like the hassle of sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Used for wedding in vases! Lasted the entire length of the reception.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Longevity
customer_reviews.text: Utilized these candles for wedding reception, provided great ambiance to the center pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 hours!
customer_reviews.text: I tested a candle in a jar with water since they’ll be used for my wedding, they lasted a full 9 hours!! I was surprised and very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Defective candles
customer_reviews.text: Half were defective and wouldn't light at my wedding it was horrible!
customer_reviews.author: andy addis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floating candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles were delivered quickly and in great condition! Large size and tested one in water and it floats perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: These were terrible. Bought them for a candle lighting ceremony and they either didn’t light or stay lit.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for special events..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a wedding I was decorating. The candles would not stay lit and the ones we did get to lit , didn’t stay for that way for long. Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: theresa cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the candles. They arrived on time, the stems were long, and they lasted for the entire length of the party...well over 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: MajesticStar

customer_reviews.title: Oily oily!
customer_reviews.text: Disliked that they came covered in what looked like oil which made the top of the water clowdy. Look different to what the pictures are too and to
customer_reviews.author: Kmcs14

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: These were wonderful candles. I am a florist and used them for a wedding. They were all still burning at when I returned after 8 hrs. The shape was perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth DiGiusto

customer_reviews.title: Actual size - 3 1/4" to 3 1/2", varies slightly
customer_reviews.text: These candles are nice but unfortunately are not 3" as the description states. They are about 3 1/4" to 3 1/2" which did not fit in my cylinder vases.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Less than 10hrs!
customer_reviews.text: Tried one to see if it does last 10hrs and it did not. It lasted for 8 hrs only.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: They worked perfectly for my floating candles. Some of them wouldn’t light but most would.
customer_reviews.author: Hayleyedge

customer_reviews.title: Great floating candles
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered. The candles are lovely in cylinder vases, filled with silk flowers and water. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A Braaten

customer_reviews.title: Great floating  candles!
customer_reviews.text: The candles were used for a class reunion as table centerpieces. They lasted throughout the entire event. (9 hours). Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine M. Bivens

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than 3”
customer_reviews.text: Looked good but they were definitely not 3”. They were a little over 3.25” and don’t fit the vases. We returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i sent them back I tested one and it burned for approximately 4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Does not last 10 hours
customer_reviews.text: Did not last 10 hours. Only lasted 5 very upset. It reads for 10 hours obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Candles came used
customer_reviews.text: Order was received quickly however all the candles have been used. They were thrown in a box and wicks are black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Long lasting, stayed lite, looked great. Came in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all the same size
customer_reviews.text: Some of the candles were larger than others and didn’t fit into my candle holders for my wedding
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jereczek

customer_reviews.title: They not work
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, do not wast your money. I put 15 in my pool, only three stayed on for a few hours, the other turned off as soon as they were placed in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Burn way too quickly. Didn’t last 2 hours of a five hour affair
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Received dirty candles
customer_reviews.text: All the candles were very dirty when I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Madson

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Christmas wedding and they look wonderful and fit perfectly in standard size vases
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Christenberry

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Great product! They were a perfect fit for my wedding centerpieces. Couldn’t find a better product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as stated
customer_reviews.text: These lasted at least the ten hours Used in bistro tables at a large party
customer_reviews.author: Jean Wiener

customer_reviews.title: That Im helping a small business
customer_reviews.text: I just used them last night and they work great for my xmas plans
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Wedding!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my wedding. I used some of them for the engagement party to test their burn time. I burned them for over 6 hours, and there's still candle left for another round! Such a great value! I will be ordering more so I have enough for all the tables.
customer_reviews.author: kImYOnkOO

customer_reviews.title: Check for fit before event!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an event I was decorating and I made a mistake of not trying to put the candle in the vase beforehand because I assumed they would fit. Not the case!! These candles are supposed to be 3" but I recd candles more like 3.5" and none of them fit my cylinder vases so I had to have the flowers in there with the water and no candles! That did not make me too happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyland~00

customer_reviews.title: WAY too big
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in these. Bought them in bulk for my wedding centerpiece vases and they are WAY bigger than the 2.85” measurement the product specifications claim to be. They are over 3” and won’t fit in my vases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they are all the same!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these candles in April to test out with my vases for my wedding in August. They were a perfect fit so I didnt worry about them. I ordered the same candles again this month for my wedding. While the boxes said they were the same size (3 inches) as I had ordered in April, they weren’t! I had people the day before my wedding shaving candles with a pocket knife so they’d fit in the vases. Overall, the candles were a good quality and lasted, but make sure if you order multiple cases, they are all the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Shopping around in a couple stores and online, I found these were the best bargain. They were perfect and came packaged well. I used them for my wedding. Just keep in mind that you can’t wet the wick or it won’t light
customer_reviews.author: valery

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sons wedding and I was amazed at how long they lasted. They burned for 6 hours or more and they still look barely used. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joye Weis

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. They came packaged good & they do float nicely. I have not burned any so I don't know about longevity. (Maybe I can update the review afterwards) Plan on using for my wedding reception, I have high hopes for burn time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tankard

customer_reviews.title: bad design
customer_reviews.text: did not burn any near claimed time due to wick placement. they need some technical help to get a good product. won't but again.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: these are hard to find in local stores
customer_reviews.text: I had a floating candle set up to give someone and no candle. I was thankful to find these online. the candle ring and holder were perfect, and the candle setting in the water was perfect.. The only thing I would have like to have was a red and white striped one. I was thankful to find these though.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Melted candles
customer_reviews.text: Candles were all completely melted when they were delivered. I am using these for my wedding and they were completely deformed and melted. I never got any response from the company either. I would not recommend buying these from this place.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: No Mas and long lasting candle
customer_reviews.text: The candle lasted throughout the entire event and it was very easy cleanup as I could take the empty clear container right out of the votive without any mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty and looked used.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived dirty and with a label/sticker that said used and candles look used.
customer_reviews.author: Kam

product_meta.title: Stock Your Home 10 Hour Burning White Unscented Classic Floating Candles for Weddings, Parties, Special Occasions and Home Decorations (Set of 24)
feature_bullets: STOCK YOUR HOME FLOATING CANDLES: These classic floating candles are very popular and safe to use. They also float evenly on water. Each candle measures 2.85 inches wide.
SET THE MOOD: Floating candles are a great centerpiece for any table setting adding a touch of elegance. These candles can illuminate any space creating a warm ambiance.
MADE IN USA: These floating candles were made in America with quality wax and lead free wicks.
BURNING INSTRUCTIONS: Place candle in cup, bowl, or container of water. Trim wicks to ¼ inch (0.6 cm) before lighting.
SAFETY WARNING: To prevent fire, keep burning candle within sight. Keep out of reach of children and pets. Never burn on a near anything that can catch fire.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars460 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
